sen.j: 京都府立体育館（きょうとふりつ たいいくかん）は、京都府京都市北区 (京都市)にある体育館である。
sen.e: Kyoto Prefectural Gymnasium is a gymnasium located in Kita Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Kyoto Prefectural Gymnasium is a gymnasium located in Kita Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Kyoto Prefectural Gymnasium is a gymnasium located in Kita Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.

tit.cmt: 他ファイルに合わせました。

sen.e: The gymnasium was opened on October 10, (Health Sports Day) 1971.
The gymnasium opened October 10, (Health Sports Day) 1971.
The gymnasium opened October 10 (Health Sports Day), 1971.
sen.cmt: カンマの位置を変えました。

sen.j: 第1競技場は座席数は最大8,635人。
sen.e: The primary stadium has a seating capacity of 8635.
The primary stadium has a seating capacity of 8635.
The main stadium has a seating capacity of 8635.

sen.j: コンサートや、バレーボール、バスケットボールの公式戦などが利用されている。
sen.e: It is used for concerts and official games for volleyball and basketball.
It is used for concerts and official games of volleyball and basketball.
It is used for concerts and official games of volleyball and basketball.

sen.j: JR山陰本線円町駅から徒歩6分
sen.e: 6 minutes walk from the Enmachi Station, the JR Saninhon Line.
6 minutes walk from the Enmachi Station, JR Saninhon Line.
Six minutes walk from Enmachi Station, JR Sanin Main Line.
sen.cmt: スペルアウトし、表現を変えました。

sen.j: バス大将軍から徒歩6分
sen.e: 6 minutes walk from the Daishogun bus stop.
6 minutes walk from the Daishogun bus stop.
Six minutes walk from Daishogun Bus Stop
